summary: Completed comprehensive testing of Volo travel deals aggregator. Backend APIs fully functional with 100% success rate. Frontend loads correctly with proper design compliance. Search functionality, deal cards, filters, and stats all working as expected. Minor dropdown interaction issue identified but doesn't affect core functionality.

ui_bugs.issue: Dropdown option selection requires force=True due to multiple element detection
ui_bugs.workaround: Direct value setting works, only affects automated testing

passed_tests: Backend /api/stats returns correct statistics (37 total offers, 21 flights, 16 cruises)
Backend /api/search accepts parameters and returns results
Offer validation with authenticity flags working
Homepage loads with hero section and stats
Search form accepts airport codes, dates, and filters
Deal cards display pricing, discounts, verification badges correctly
Filter sidebar min discount slider functional
Stats bar shows flight/cruise counts and discounts
Design follows Space Grotesk typography guidelines
Color scheme matches design specifications (slate-900 hero, orange-500 discounts)
Layout uses proper container max-width and border radius
All interactive elements have proper data-testid attributes
